about_the_game:
FRACTALS OF DESTINY developed by KRAKATOA STUDIOS is an exhilarating hybrid RPG, which seamlessly combines the best features from Action RPGs with Classic RPGs. Prepare to embark on a thrilling adventure where the beloved turn-based system intertwines with breathtaking action sequences, creating a very accessible, captivating, and memorable gameplay experience.

Fractals of Destiny offers a stimulating blend of action, strategy, and exploration, ensuring every moment is filled with excitement. Find yourself immersed in a rich narrative-woven adventure with interconnected side quests, each intricately tied to the main storyline. Carefully follow the available clues to unveil hidden surprises along the journey.

STORY

The year is 5823, and the universe is ravaged by a cataclysmic war between the Velixar Azartus of the West Universe, led by the formidable Zeranos, and the Light Empire of the East Universe, commanded by the legendary Anum'Ra. This century-long conflict has left the universe on the brink of destruction, with the United Alliance unable to intervene due to dwindling troops and resources.

Amidst this chaos, a remarkable woman named Zerva emerges. Born of a unique heritage, she possesses extraordinary gifts that set her apart from ordinary people. She can only hope to win this battle by rising in rank, to become the greatest-known general of the United Alliance, bringing hope to the universe.

After the war, Zerva found love with her partner by the name of Eldran, and together they vowed to keep the peace.

However, destiny tells us a different story...

GAME FEATURES

Epic Storyline

Offering a rich and engaging narrative and character-driven quests, that immerse you in the game world.


Skill-based Progression

Providing a system that allows you to unlock and improve abilities and talents, alongside experience gain and character levelling. This offers deeper specialization and character customization.

Legendary Boss Fights

Prepare for heroic and challenging boss encounters with unique mechanics, phases and strategies to test your skill.

Semi-Open World Exploration

As you explore, find a vast and immersive world, filled with diverse landscapes, cities, and hidden secrets and dangers.

Crafting and Itemization

A robust crafting system is included, which features resource gathering and crafting of weapons, armor, potions, and other items which enhance your character's abilities and gear customization.

Character Customization

A wide range of options are available to customize your character's skills, abilities, and playstyle.

Sub-Mission System

A sub-mission system is implemented that complements the main storyline and contract missions, offering optional objectives, side quests, and additional explorable content.


Talent System

Create a build to suit YOUR unique playstyle on the battlefield.

Visual and Audio Immersion

Features stunning graphics, atmospheric sound design, and an epic soundtrack, which draw you into the game and enrich your overall experience

movies.name: Fractals of Destiny a New Hybrid RPG Combat Trailer

name: FRACTALS OF DESTINY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600 / Intel® Core™ i5-6500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 570 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 TI / 3GB VRAM required
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen™ 7 2700x / Intel® Core™ i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ RX 5700 / NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1080 / 8GB VRAM required
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 35 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible using the latest drivers

short_description: FRACTALS OF DESTINY features new gameplay called Hybrid RPG, great visuals and epic story delivered by extraordinary heroine.
supported_languages:
English*, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
